review: a bit of a downgrade compared to the eternal lords dlc but i think this is a good dlc as well the halfings are unique in the fact that their units are really squishy and you need to keep the enemy at bay and you want to be in their preferred environment the naggas are also fun to use if you actually manage to get one of those and the roaming units also help enrich the adventure part of the game i do recommend the dlc even though it may be preferrable if you do it on a sale
game_title: Age of Wonders III - Golden Realms

review: nice dlc with new race new mechanics and new 3mission campaing featuring halflings and seals of power

review: this is a fun little addition to the rest of the game the halflings are a cheeky and slightly goofy race as are a lot of the other things added monkeys throwing poo at enemies and the campaign is short and entertaining minor race dwellings are always welcome and the naga are pretty neat offering some more variety in the naval game overall a worthwhile addition to the base game  get this and the eternal lords and youre all set for some fantasy warfare fun

review: a great meaty expansion filled with lots of new great content lots of new units a new race and dwelling items campaigns structures music etc everthing you wish for in a good expansion it expands the age of wonders world in a great way if you love aow3 and want more of it then this is a must have

review: halflings are adorable they have the unique luck mechanism  giving them a chance based on their morale of dodging attacks in battle nothing beats it when this mechanism is triggered in battle   apart from the new race the expansion includes many other things like a campaign a new dwelling type many new items and two specializations with new spells   this dlc should not be missed if you like the base age of wonders iii
